Verses: 1 seekkiraththil Sambavikkavendiyavaigalaith Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaararukkuk Kaanbikkumporuttu, Dhevan Yesukiristhuvukku Oppuviththadhum, Ivar Thammudaiya Thoodhanai Anuppi, Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Yovaanukku Velippaduththinadhumaana Visesham.
2 ivan Dhevanudaiya Vasanaththaikkuriththum, Yesukiristhuvaippatriya Saatchiyaikkuriththum, Thaan Kanda Yaavatraiyum Saatchiyaaga Ariviththirukkiraan.
3 indhath Theerkkadharisana Vasanangalai Vaasikkiravanum, Ketkiravargalum, Idhil Ezhudhiyirukkiravaigalaik Kaikkollukiravargalum Baakkiyavaangal, Kaalam Sameebamaayirukkiradhu.
4 yovaan Aasiyaavilulla Ezhusabaigalukkum Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu: Irukkiravarum Irundhavarum Varugiravarumaanavaraalum, Avarudaiya Singaasanaththirku Munbaaga Irukkira Ezhu Aavigalaalum,
5 unmaiyulla Saatchiyum, Mariththorilirundhu Mudharpirandhavarum, Boomiyin Raajaakkalukku Adhibadhiyumaagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.

6 nammidaththil Anbukoorndhu Thamadhu Raththaththinaale Nammudaiya Paavangalara Nammaik Kazhuvi, Thammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukku Munbaaga Nammai Raajaakkalum Aasaariyargalumaakkina Avarukku Magimaiyum Vallamaiyum Endrendraikkum Undaayiruppadhaaga. Aamen.

7 idho, Megangaludane Varugiraar; Kangal Yaavum Avaraik Kaanum, Avaraik Kuththinavargalum Avaraik Kaanbaargal; Boomiyin Koththiraththaarellaarum Avaraip Paarththup Pulampuvaargal. Appadiye Aagum Aamen.
8 irukkiravarum Irundhavarum Varugiravarumaagiya Sarvavallamaiyulla Karththar: Naan Albaavum, Omegaavum Aadhiyum Andhamumaayirukkiren Endru Thiruvulampatrugiraar.

9 ungal Sagodharanum Yesu Kiristhuvinimiththam Varugira Ubaththiravaththirkum Avarudaiya Raajyaththirkum Avarudaiya Porumaikkum Ungal Udanpangaalanumaayirukkira Yovaanaagiya Naan Dhevavasanaththinimiththamum, Yesukiristhuvaippatriya Saatchiyinimiththamum Padhmu Ennum Theevile Irundhen.
10 karththarudaiya Naalil Aavikkullaanen; Appozhudhu Enakkup Pinnaale Ekkaalasaththampondra Peridhaana Oru Saththaththaik Ketten.

11 adhu Naan Albaavum Omegaavum, Mundhinavarum Pindhinavarumaayirukkiren. Nee Kaangiradhai Oru Pusthakaththil Ezhudhi, Aasiyaavilirukkira Ebesu, Simirnaa, Pergamu, Thiyaththeeraa, Sardhai, Piladhelpiyaa, Lavodhikkeyaa Ennum Pattanangalilulla Ezhu Sabaigalukkum Anuppu Endru Vilambinadhu.
12 appozhudhu Ennudane Pesina Saththaththaip Paarkkath Thirumbinen; Thirumbinapodhu, Ezhu Pon Kuththuvilakkugalaiyum,
13 andha Ezhu Kuththuvilakkugalin Maththiyile Nilaiyangi Thariththu, Maarbaruke Porkachchai Kattiyirundha Manushakumaaranukkoppaanavaraiyum Kanden.
14 avarudaiya Sirasum Mayirum Venpanjaippolavum Uraindha Mazhaiyaippolavum Venmaiyaayirundhadhu; Avarudaiya Kangal Akkinijuvaalaiyaip Polirundhadhu;
15 avarudaiya Paadhangal Ulaikkalaththil Kaaindha Piragaasamaana Vengalampolirundhadhu; Avarudaiya Saththam Peruvellaththu Iraichchalaippolirundhadhu.

16 thamadhu Valadhukaraththile Ezhu Natchaththirangalai Endhikkondirundhaar; Avar Vaayilirundhu Irupuramum Karukkulla Pattayam Purappattadhu; Avarudaiya Mugam Vallamaiyaaip Piragaasikkira Sooriyanaip Polirundhadhu.

17 naan Avaraik Kandapodhu Seththavanaippola Avarudaiya Paadhaththil Vizhundhen; Appozhudhu Avar Thammudaiya Valadhukaraththai Enmelvaiththu, Ennai Nokki: Payappadaadhe, Naan Mundhinavarum Pindhinavarum, Uyirullavarumaayirukkiren;
18 mariththen, Aanaalum, Idho, Sadhaakaalangalilum Uyirodirukkiren, Aamen; Naan Maranaththirkum Paadhaalaththirkumuriya Thiravukolkalai Udaiyavaraayirukkiren.
19 nee Kandavaigalaiyum, Irukkiravaigalaiyum, Ivaigalukkuppinbu Sambavippavaigalaiyum Ezhudhu;

20 en Valadhukaraththil Nee Kanda Ezhunatchaththirangalin Ragasiyaththaiyum, Ezhupon Kuththuvilakkugalin Ragasiyaththaiyum Ezhudhu; Andha Ezhu Natchaththirangalum Ezhu Sabaigalin Thoodhargalaam; Nee Kanda Ezhu Kuththuvilakkugalum Ezhu Sabaigalaam.
